body:
Without this link dep and Spack's compiler wrappers, psycopg2 can pick up postgresql from the system at run-time and have missing symbols.

Also changed download to PyPI so that `spack versions` and `spack checksum` works, checksums appears to be the same.

Successfully installs and passes import tests on CentOS 7 with Python 3.8.10 and GCC 9.3.0.
title: py-psycopg2: need link dep on postgresql
